Title: Permits access by a victim to the proceedings of a juvenile offender
Summary: Permits access to a crime victim to information about status of case he or she was involved in and the right to participate in the proceedings of a juvenile offender.
LawCode: Amd ยง1.20, add Art 235 ยง235.10, CP L; add ยง340.3, Fam Ct Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law and the family court act, in relation to a victim's right of access to information in certain proceedings
